analysisEngineMetaData.name: JCoRe MEDLINE XML Database Multiplier
analysisEngineMetaData.description: This CAS multiplier receives information about documents to be read from an instance of the XML Database Multiplier reader from the jcore-db-reader project. The multiplier employs the jcore-xml-mapper to map the MEDLINE XML structure into CAS instances. It also supports additional tables sent by the DB Multiplier Reader that are then joined to the main table. This mechanism is used to load separate data from additional database tables and populate the CAS with them via the 'RowMapping' parameter. This component is part of the Jena Document Information System, JeDIS.

configurationParameter.name: RowMapping
configurationParameter.description: In case that the CoStoSys active table schema specified more than two columns to be retrieved, the other columns need a mapping into the CAS.A mapping item has the following form: <column index>=<uima type>#<type feature>:<feature datatype>:defaultValue where the defaultValue is optional. Example: 2=de.julielab.jules.types.max_xmi_id#id:int:0 maps the content of the third (index 2, zero-based) retrieved column (may also belong to an additional table!) to feature "id" of the type "d.j.j.t.max_xmi_id" which is an int. In case there is no value returned from the database for a document, use a 0 as default.

configurationParameter.name: MappingFile
configurationParameter.description: An XML mapping file following the specification required by the jcore-xml-mapper. The mapping file specifies how contents from an XML docuent are to be brought into the CAS.
